original_text: Other seeds fell on ground which had rocks. There was not much soil in that place. The seeds quickly began to grow, because the soil was not deep.
korean_text: 더러는 흙이 얕은 돌밭에 떨어지매 흙이 깊지 아니하므로 곧 싹이 나오나

sentences.original_text: Other seeds fell on ground which had rocks
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 씨앗들은 돌이 있는 땅에 떨어졌습니다

sentences.original_text: There was not much soil in that place
The seeds quickly began to grow
because the soil was not deep
